title: Shinigami no Ballad.
sinopse:
A Shinigami girl in white, unlike other Shinigami...

A Shinigami girl meddling with humans, even those not meant to die, unlike other Shinigami...

Shinigami A#100100, aka Momo, not only leads the souls of the deceased to the other world, but also leads the living to a better life, helping them overcome death...

(Source: MU)
